'bu'jiang'shi'yan'kan'chun'xin 不将诗眼看春心
'bu'jiang'xin'ju'ji'zi'you 不将新句纪兹游
'bu'jiang'zui'yu'zuo'xin'shi 不将醉语作新诗
'bu'jiao'li'du'du'qi'ming 不教李杜独齐名
'bu'jiao'li'hen'shang'mei'duo 不教离恨上眉多
'bu'jiao'wan'zhuan'zhu'feng'lei 不教宛转助风雷
'bu'jiao'yi'tan 不交一谈
'bu'jie'diao'chong'fu 不解雕虫赋
'bu'jie'jiao'nong'bu'bai'tou 不解教侬不白头
'bu'jie'ting'qian'bai'jie'zhi 不解庭前百结枝
'bu'jin'chen'tu'wu'yi'qun 不禁尘土污衣裙
'bu'jin'geng'wei'tu 不尽更危途
'bu'jin'yu'shan'chuan 不尽禹山川
'bu'jing'an'yong'huo 不精安用夥
'bu'jing'xin'sui'huan 不惊新岁换
'bu'jiu'feng'lun'zuo 不救风轮左
'bu'jiu'gui'zhuang'pin 不救归装贫
'bu'ju'jin'liu'shui 卜居近流水
'bu'jue'bing'zhi'ci 不觉病至此
'bu'jue'hu'bian'yi'ye'shuang 不觉湖边一夜霜
'bu'jue'ku'zhi'tong 不觉哭之恸
'bu'jue'nan'feng'chui'jiu'xing 不觉南风吹酒醒
'bu'jue'qing'lin'mei'wan'chao 不觉青林没晚潮
'bu'kan'chen'ji'xi 不堪陈几席
'bu'kan'chun'jie'shou 不堪春解手
'bu'kan'feng'wu'suo'xin'shi 不堪风物索新诗
'bu'kan'hui'shou'du'liang'lu 不堪回首都梁路
'bu'kan'hui'shou'lei'ying'ying 不堪回首泪盈盈
'bu'kan'hui'shou'wang'wu'yun 不堪回首望吴云
'bu'kan'jiu'ke'zhi'si'gui 不堪久客只思归
'bu'kan'li'bie'lei'zhan'yi 不堪离别泪沾衣
'bu'kan'pin'chang'zhe'gu'ci 不堪频唱鹧鸪辞
'bu'kan'sui'li'run'tian'chang 不堪岁里闰添长
'bu'kan'xi'yu'shi'huang'hun 不堪细雨湿黄昏
'bu'kan'you'qi'jin'cheng'jiu 不堪有七今成九
'bu'ke'chen'tu'za 不可尘土杂
'bu'ke'gui'lai'lao'geng'yong 逋客归来老更慵
'bu'ke'liang'shu 不可量数
'bu'ke'qi'ru'bu'shi'yi 不可骑入步是宜
'bu'ken'dao'tou'ting 不肯到头厅
'bu'ken'di'xin'shi'juan'zao 不肯低心事镌凿
'bu'ken'shi'jing'du 不肯仕京都
'bu'ken'shi'rong'shuo 不肯事容说
'bu'ken'shou'ji'pei 不肯受羁辔
'bu'ken'tou'sheng'zuo'ren'fu 不肯偷生作人妇
'bu'ken'wo'gan'shi 不肯我干时
'bu'ken'xiang'sui'guo'long'tou 不肯相随过陇头
'bu'ken'yi'shi'jiao 不肯以时叫
'bu'ken'ying'chao'xiang'bei'bian 不肯营巢向北边
'bu'lao'hu'ruo'zhuan'ning'ju 补劳护弱转凝聚
'bu'lao'san'chi'jian 不劳三尺剑
'bu'le'qi'zhi'ji 不乐栖枳棘
'bu'le'wo'he'ceng 不乐我何曾
'bu'lei'jin'zhi'le'fu 不类今之乐府
'bu'lei'ren'jian'shi 不类人间世
'bu'lei'zi'yu'ding 不类子与丁
'bu'li'du'kang'si 不立杜康祀
'bu'li'qi'wang'zhai 不历岐王宅
'bu'liang'hao'shi'jie 不量好时节
'bu'liao'duo'cai'neng'zhuan'wu 不料多材能转物
'bu'liao'xing'shan'qi 不料腥膻起
'bu'ling'chu'wei'jian'shui'qi 簿领初为建水栖
'bu'ling'fen'fen'xi'ci'shi 簿领纷纷惜此时
'bu'ling'reng'duo'xia 簿领仍多暇
'bu'ling'wu'fan'yong 簿领无烦壅
'bu'ling'zi'fu'gui'qu'lai 不令自赋归去来
'bu'liu'yan'mian'dui'sha'ou 不留颜面对沙鸥
'bu'lou'fu'bu'chi 不陋复不侈
'bu'lu'jiu'kong'wang 不录久恐忘
'bu'lun'chai'gu'yu'zhui'sha 不论钗股与锥沙
'bu'lun'dong'meng'zhong 不论冬孟仲
'bu'lun'ke'zi'chou'wu'na 不论客子愁无那
'bu'lun'shao'zhu'liang'jie'qi 不论烧煮两皆奇
'bu'lv'sai'chen'kai 不虑塞尘开
'bu'lv'yu'zou'chi 步履欲走驰
'bu'mai'bu'ji 不麦不稷
'bu'mai'yi'wei'shen 不买一微哂
'bu'mei 不寐
'bu'mei'er'shou 不寐二首
'bu'mei'fang'xiao'xing 不寐方宵行
'bu'mei'ting'qiao'men 不寐听谯门
'bu'mei'xiang'kan'wei'li'ma 不寐相看唯枥马
'bu'mian'bu'xi'ming'chao'bu 不眠不惜明朝补
'bu'mian'dong'guo'xing 不免东郭行
'bu'mian'du'zi'bu'feng'lang 不眠独自步风廊
'bu'mian'he'ceng'jiu 不面何曾久
'bu'mian'jiu'xi'gao'shi'xiao 不免旧溪高士笑
'bu'mian'yan'dan'qian'dun'tao 不免厌旦潜遁逃
'bu'mian'zi'sao'pu 不免自扫扑
'bu'mie'wei'zhen'kong 不灭惟真空
'bu'min'shen'qiong'tai 不闵身穷泰
'bu'mo'er'jian'ji 不默而见忌
'bu'mu'she'chan'tui 不慕蛇蝉蜕
'bu'neng'bao'kui'huo 不能饱葵藿
'bu'neng'dao'ye 不能到也
'bu'neng'diao'she'jiang'fu'hui 不能掉舌强附会
'bu'neng'qi'ma'chen'chao'ban 不能骑马趁朝班
'bu'neng'wei'yi'xue 不能为一吷
'bu'neng'wen'jiu'xi 不能温旧习
'bu'neng'wu'xin'ran 不能无欣然
'bu'neng'xin'ku'you'pan'ji 不能辛苦又攀跻
'bu'neng'xuan'chun'hua 不能宣淳化
'bu'ni'dao'mao'ci 不拟到茅茨
'bu'ni'geng'yi'hai 不拟更移还
'bu'ni'gou'quan'hui 不逆沟畎浍
'bu'ni'tan'piao'ling 不拟叹漂零
'bu'nian'gu'ren'gui 不念故人归
'bu'nian'kong'zhai'lao'bing'sou 不念空斋老病叟
'bu'nian'qing'huan'ben'wu'jia 不念清欢本无价
'bu'nian'zi'shi'qu'ru'shi 不念兹时去如失
'bu'pa'huai'he'geng'feng'lang 不怕淮河更风浪
'bu'pa'man'jiang'yu 不怕蛮江浴
'bu'pa'mei'hua'sai'que'ren 不怕梅花赛却人
'bu'pu'nong'qi'ye 不谱农器也
'bu'qi'feng'yu'geng'qi'qi 不期风雨更凄凄
'bu'qi'lang'miao'zhi'qing'tui 补葺廊庙枝倾颓
'bu'qi'shen'yu'pu 步欹身欲仆
'bu'qian'chuan'mi'lu 不遣船迷路
'bu'qian'feng'zhi'yu'jue'xiu 不遣风知雨觉休
'bu'qian'hua'chou'ban'dian'han 不遣花愁半点寒
'bu'qian'li'jiang'gan 不遣立江干
'bu'qian'shui'duo'fang'wei'bo 不遣水多防味薄
'bu'qian'tao'tou'guo'fu'chun 不遣涛头过富春
'bu'qian'wo'xin'jiang 不遣我心降
'bu'qian'yu'xia'guo'bie'tang 不遣鱼虾过别塘
'bu'qian'zhu'si'juan'guo'yao 不倩蛛丝罥果肴
'bu'qin'tu'zi'fan 不寝徒自烦
'bu'qin'yi'jiao'shui 布衾一觉睡
'bu'qiu'luo'po'wei'dai'huan 布裘落魄韦带缓
'bu'qiu'yuan'chu'shi 不求鹓雏实
'bu'qu'chi'zhong'wei'yong'rong 步趋持重为雍容
'bu'qu'ruo'xun'fu 不去若驯伏
'bu'qu'sao'qing'tian'bei'wu 不去扫清天北雾
'bu'qu'shui'xun'jiu'jiang'qi 部曲谁寻旧将旗
'bu'qu'xi'fan'shi'bao'cheng 不取西番石堡城
'bu'qu'xiu'lai'wu'shui'hen 补去修来无水痕
'bu'qu'yi'zhu'wu'xian'xiao 部曲易主无纤嚣
'bu'que'wang'zhi'fang 补阙王直方
'bu'ran 不然
'bu'ran'gen'yu'fa 不染根与发
'bu'ran'hang'jiang'wai 不然航江外
'bu'ran'kan'shan'hai'wu'shi 不然看山还误事
'bu'ran'qi'yan'xi 不然弃砚席
'bu'ran'shen'qi'fan 不然神器翻
'bu'ran'yi'he'yun'tai'shang 不然亦合云台上
'bu'ran'yi'ke'dian 不然衣可典
'bu'ran'ze'yi'di 不然则宜籴
'bu'ran'zhu'cang'sheng 不然诸苍生
'bu'rang'xi'shuai'qing 不让蟋蟀清
'bu'ren'cang'zu'hui'can'fei 不忍苍卒回骖騑
'bu'ren'chen'xiang'yuan 不忍沉湘沅
'bu'ren'gou'wo'yu 不忍钩我鱼
'bu'ren'qu'ye 不忍去也
'bu'ri'bian'guai'chai 不日便乖拆
'bu'rong'zhu'ju'geng'lun'qian 不容朱橘更论钱

'bu'xia'xin'chuan'shi'shui'chu 步下新船试水初
'bu'xian'ci'shi'yi'yan'kai 不嫌刺史亦颜开
'bu'xian'su'shi'wu'dan'ti 不嫌俗士污丹梯
'bu'xian'yu'huo'luan'shu'deng 不嫌渔火乱书灯
'bu'xian'zi'tuo'fen'yu'shi 不羡紫駞分御食
'bu'xiang'ci'jian'xiu'xie'qu 不向此间休歇去
'bu'xiang'nan'hua'jie'xiang'huo 不向南华结香火
'bu'xiang'ren'jian'sheng'hao'fa 不向人间生皓发
'bu'xiao'er'yi'yi 不孝而已矣
'bu'xie'gui'lai'wei'jue'lao 步屟归来未觉劳
'bu'xin'fu'ming'shi'shen'lei 不信浮名是身累
'bu'xin'ji'jiang'you'qi'lu 不信姬姜有齐鲁
'bu'xin'quan'sheng'yu'shi'bei 不信全生庾氏碑
'bu'xin'ren'jian'you'xu'you 不信人间有许由
'bu'xing'ting'xia'lu 不行亭下路
'bu'xiu'nai'suo'ni 不朽乃所拟
'bu'xiu'zai'ming'de 不朽在名德
'bu'xu'bei'ke'ci'jiu'jiang 不许北客辞酒浆
'bu'xu'chi'ling'yun 不须持岭云
'bu'xu'chou'guo'bu 不须愁国步
'bu'xu'di'fei'ji'tian'tan 不须地肺及天坛
'bu'xu'diao'ke'fang'gan'pi 不许雕刻妨肝脾
'bu'xu'dong'jun'li'zi'feng 不许东君利自封
'bu'xu'duo'wen'mu'hou'guan 不须多问沐猴冠
'bu'xu'gao'sheng'chang'dai'yan 不许高声唱玳筵
'bu'xu'geng'dai'fei'zi'xiao 不须更待妃子笑
'bu'xu'geng'dai'qiu'jing'ta 不须更待秋井塌
'bu'xu'geng'shi'wu'lou'fa 不须更师屋漏法
'bu'xu'geng'yong'bo'ma'lv 不须更用博麻缕
'bu'xu'hao'ling'zi'jing'ming 不须号令自精明
'bu'xu'jian'bao'xie 不须兼鲍谢
'bu'xu'jian'wo'hai'fei'qu 不须见我还飞去
'bu'xu'lan'jing'zhao'qing'xi 不须览镜照清溪
'bu'xu'qin'rong'hang 不须亲戎行
'bu'xu'ren'xiao'wo'xin'zhi 不须人笑我心知
'bu'xu'sao'shou'xun'yi'shi 不须搔首寻遗事
'bu'xu'sui'shi'wen'rong'ku 不须随世问荣枯
'bu'xu'xian'sheng'jiu'wo'long 不许先生久卧龙
'bu'xu'xie'ru'xun'feng'qu 不须写入薰风曲
'bu'xu'yong'ji'cheng'ge'wu 不须拥妓呈歌舞
'bu'xu'yu'jiu'yuan'xiu'cai 不须庾韭元修菜
'bu'xu'yu'qi'ye'xing'tian 不须驭气夜行天
'bu'xu'zhong'xiang'deng'qian'qi 不须重向灯前泣
'bu'xue'fu'tu'geng'da'bao 不学浮屠更打包
'bu'xue'liu'ling'du'zi'yin 不学刘伶独自饮
'bu'xue'shan'wang'cheng'si'ma 不学山王乘驷马
'bu'xue'yang'guan'kong'duan'chang 不学阳关空断肠
'bu'xun'song'xiao'kuan'han'xia 步寻松篠款谽谺
'bu'yan'guo'cong'pin 不厌过从频
'bu'yan'long'tou'qian'bai'shu 不厌垅头千百树
'bu'yao'zhao'hu'zi'yao'xing 不要招呼自要行
'bu'yi'cheng'shan'ji 不倚成山积
'bu'yi'guo'wo 不一过我
'bu'yi'jia 不易贾
'bu'yi'li'da 不以礼答
'bu'yi'qian'mo'dong'cheng'qun 布衣阡陌动成群
'bu'yi'qin'zhen'sui 不以衾枕随
'bu'yi'shen'shi'zai'di'shang 不疑身世在地上
'bu'yin'hu'wei'zui'wu'wu 不饮胡为醉兀兀
'bu'yin'shuang'ye'ci'lin'qu 不因霜叶辞林去
'bu'yin'tong'li'jian'tong'xing 不因同里兼同姓
'bu'yin'xiao'jin'chuan'yu'shou 不饮销金传玉手
'bu'yin'ye'ou'yuan'chuang'jia 不因噎呕缘疮痂
'bu'ying'dang'shi'you 不应当时游
'bu'ying'dun'xing'shang'sui'gong 不应墩姓尚随公
'bu'ying'duo'qu'hai'shan'liang 不应多取海山凉
'bu'ying'geng'zuo'tu'lao'tan 不应更作徒劳叹
'bu'ying'hui'shou'geng'si'jia 不应回首更思家
'bu'ying'jiang'yi'di 不应将一第
'bu'ying'lan'han'ren'ren'chi'gu'bo 不应婪酣任人嗤穀伯
'bu'ying'lin'gan'geng'nan'cai 不应临感更难裁
'bu'ying'qiong'huo'ji 不应穷活计
'bu'ying'quan'wei'zhuo'chang'you 不应全为拙倡优
'bu'ying'shi'you'di 不应师友地
'bu'ying'wu'yin'wan'feng'bian 不应雾隐万峰边
'bu'ying'yao'luo'shi'chou'ren 不应摇落始愁人
'bu'ying'yi'bao'ji 不应一饱计
'bu'ying'you'xian'san 不应又闲散
'bu'ying'zhang'zhen'jiu 不应樟镇酒
'bu'yong'can'deng'huo 不用残灯火
'bu'yong'chang'chou'gua'yue'cun 不用长愁挂月村
'bu'yong'chen'qu'zhi'xiao'qu 不用嗔渠只笑渠
'bu'yong'cheng'chang'zhu'fu'wen'zi'wu'qian'juan 不用撑肠拄腹文字五千卷
'bu'yong'er'nv'qi 不用儿女泣
'bu'yong'fang'qiu'geng'da'bing 不用防秋更打冰
'bu'yong'hong'sha'zhao'zuo'yu 不用红纱照座隅
'bu'yong'lai'xiang'wen 不用来相闻
'bu'yong'ling'guang'fu'sheng'wu 不用灵光符圣武
'bu'yong'shan'seng'dao'wo'qian 不用山僧导我前
'bu'yong'zu'ku'wei'shi'zhang 不用卒苦为诗章
'bu'yong'zuo'lin'yu 不用作霖雨
'bu'you'hui'bo 步有回波
'bu'you'jue'ji'wu'ren'xue 不忧绝技无人学
'bu'you'li'zao'qian 不忧梨枣愆
'bu'you'men'wai'gu'ren'che 不忧门外故人车
'bu'you'ou'su'ji 不有欧苏继
'bu'you'qin'qi'si 不有亲戚思
'bu'you'shi'de'jun 不有失德君
'bu'you'ta'chuan'fan 不忧踏船翻
'bu'you'zhi'zai'ming 不忧知在命
'bu'yu 不语
'bu'yu'bian'ta'ju 不与獱獭居
'bu'yu'cang'ren'fu'zhe'xian 不与伧人付谪仙
'bu'yu'chen'lei'xiang'zhui'pan 不欲尘累相追攀
'bu'yu'dan'he'ri 不雨但赫日
'bu'yu'deng'hun'xian 不欲登昏憸
'bu'yu'dui'yi'fu 不语对以腹
'bu'yu'jiang'shi'feng 不与匠石逢
'bu'yu'mei'qian'pu 捕鱼没浅浦
'bu'yu'qian'hua'zhi'guo'se 不御铅华知国色
'bu'yu'qian'ta'ren 不欲遣他人
'bu'yu'qiu'chi'yan'wei'qing 不遇丘迟眼为青
'bu'yu'qun'shan'jie 不与群山接
'bu'yu'ren'jian'shi'bi'zhi 不与人间史笔知
'bu'yu'sheng'tong'you 不与圣同忧
'bu'yu'shi'xiang'jie 不与世相接
'bu'yu'wang'shi'tong 不与往时同
'bu'yu'xie'xie'xiao'sheng'dou 不欲屑屑校升斗
'bu'yu'xiu'rang'qi 不与朽壤期
'bu'yu'zhuo'wen'jun 不遇卓文君
'bu'yuan'bai'jin'yi 不愿百金易
'bu'yuan'er'ji'liu 不源而计流
'bu'yuan'geng'qiao'de 不缘耕樵得
'bu'yuan'qi'zou'pu 不缘憩驺仆
'bu'yuan'shu'lai'xi'cai'jian 不愿书来系彩笺
'bu'yuan'zeng'chao'shang'lin'yuan 不愿增巢上林苑
'bu'yuan'zhe'jiao'jin'hua'dian 不愿着脚金华殿
'bu'yue 步月
'bu'zai'a'ru'xia 不在阿儒下
'bu'zai'ge'huai'xian 不载割淮鲜
'bu'zai'ren'jian'nan'xi'shu 布在人间难悉数
'bu'zai'xian'sheng'shen 不在先生身
'bu'zai'yu'yan'tong 不在语言同
'bu'zeng'yi'bu'fu 不甑亦不釜
'bu'zhai'jin'you'zu 卜宅近幽阻
'bu'zhao'xiang'nan'zhou 不照湘南州
'bu'zhe'fu'ri'zhi 不折拂日枝
'bu'zhe'hong'xiang'dao'lv'zun 不折红香到绿尊
'bu'zhe'yi'zhi'kan 不折一枝看
'bu'zhi'ba'zhu'gao'tan'xu 不知把烛高谈许
'bu'zhi'bai'wan'shi 不知百万师
'bu'zhi'bie'hou'ti'duo'shao 不知别后啼多少
'bu'zhi'bing'li'huo'fen'ying 不知并力或分营
'bu'zhi'bo'jin'yi'lu'hong 不知拨尽一炉红
'bu'zhi'chan'bao'xia 不知蝉报夏
'bu'zhi'chan'suo'zhi 不知蝉所之
'bu'zhi'chan'yi'que'ru'he 不知蝉意却如何
'bu'zhi'cheng'xiang'geng'chen'bu 不知丞相更嗔不
'bu'zhi'chun'xiang'yu'zhong'hui 不知春向雨中回
'bu'zhi'ci'cuo'tuo 不知此蹉跎
'bu'zhi'ci'di'cong'jun'chu 不知此地从君处
'bu'zhi'ci'le'you'chuan'fou 不知此乐犹传否
'bu'zhi'dai'de'qiu'cheng'fou 不知待得秋成否
'bu'zhi'di'li'gu'quan'zhen 不知帝力固全真
'bu'zhi'er'qian'luo'kan'jing 不知饵牵落槛穽
'bu'zhi'fan'cang'hai 不知泛沧海
'bu'zhi'feng'yu'zuo'huang'hun 不知风雨作黄昏
'bu'zhi'gan'dan'fei'yi'jia 不知肝胆非一家
'bu'zhi'gao'gao'si 步陟高高寺
'bu'zhi'geng'you'wang'lang'zi 不知更有王郎子
'bu'zhi'geng'zuo'zao'hua'han 不知更作枣花寒
'bu'zhi'gong'zi'shi'jian'cang 不知公子是监仓
'bu'zhi'hai'you'you'ren'fou 不知还有游人否
'bu'zhi'he'chu'bai'ping'qi 不知何处白苹起
'bu'zhi'he'chu'wen'ren'shuo 不知何处闻人说
'bu'zhi'he'di'dun'xian'chou 不知何地顿闲愁
'bu'zhi'he'nu'xie'bu'ping 不知何怒泄不平
'bu'zhi'he'ri'wei'jun'kai 不知何日为君开
'bu'zhi'he'suo'lai 不知何所来
'bu'zhi'he'suo'le 不知何所乐
'bu'zhi'he'xi'ji'ji'yin 不知何喜唧唧吟
'bu'zhi'hong'ri'zai'he'chu 不知红日在何处
'bu'zhi'hu'jiu'shi'li'yan 不知呼酒是离筵
'bu'zhi'hua'hui'he'yuan'jin 不知花卉何远近
'bu'zhi'huai'xi'xian 不止怀昔贤
'bu'zhi'ji'nian'sui 不知几年岁
'bu'zhi'ji'shi'nian 不知几十年
'bu'zhi'jiang'liu'yi'yao'cun 不知江柳已摇村
'bu'zhi'jiang'shui'guo'shan'lai 不知江水过山来
'bu'zhi'jin'cun'wang 不知今存亡
'bu'zhi'jin'nian'shi'he'sui 不知今年是何岁
'bu'zhi'jin'xi'meng 不知今夕梦
'bu'zhi'jin'xi'shi'he'nian 不知今夕是何年
'bu'zhi'jun'neng'zhi'ci'bu 不知君能致此不
'bu'zhi'jun'shi'pu'zhong'wu 不知均是圃中物
'bu'zhi'ku'xue'chu 不知窟穴处
'bu'zhi'lao'seng'you'miao'shou 不知老僧有妙手
'bu'zhi'lin'chuan'he'xu'de'you'wu 不知临川何许得尤物
'bu'zhi'luo'he'chu 不知落何处
'bu'zhi'ming'zao'tian'duo'shao 不知明早添多少
'bu'zhi'niao'shi'gang'tou'lu 不知鸟石冈头路
'bu'zhi'qi'suo'lai 不知其所来
'bu'zhi'qiang'xia'lu 不知墙下路
'bu'zhi'qing'miao'mao 不知清庙茅
'bu'zhi'qing'yuan'meng 不知清远梦
'bu'zhi'ren'jian'he'chu'you'ci'jing 不知人间何处有此境
'bu'zhi'ren'jian'shi 不知人间世
'bu'zhi'san'jing'wei'shui'kai 不知三径为谁开
'bu'zhi'shan'yu'lou'zheng'chang 不知山与楼争长
'bu'zhi'shan'yue'ji'shi'luo 不知山月几时落
'bu'zhi'shen'ru'zi'you'yong 不知深入恣游泳
'bu'zhi'shen'wai'shui'wei'zhu 不知身外谁为主
'bu'zhi'shen'ye'zai'yun'jian 不知身也在云间
'bu'zhi'shi'fu'shi 不知世富室
'bu'zhi'shi'yu'mi 不知石愈密
'bu'zhi'shi'zhong'dao'he'yu 不知诗中道何语
'bu'zhi'shui'si'ling'guang 不知谁似灵光
'bu'zhi'tai'yi'you'he'chu 不知太乙游何处
'bu'zhi'tian'gong'you'yi'wu 不知天工有意无
'bu'zhi'tian'shu'zhe'mi'qian 不质田输折米钱
'bu'zhi'ting'yuan'yi'dui'yan 不知庭院已堆盐
'bu'zhi'wei'yan'you'yi'wu 不知韦偃有意无
'bu'zhi'wen'chu'shi'chang'an 不知闻处是长安
'bu'zhi'wo'yu'jun 不知我与君
'bu'zhi'wu'bei'suo'le'zai'ci 不知吾辈所乐在此
'bu'zhi'wu'jiao'dong'hua'fei 不知屋角栋花飞
'bu'zhi'xiang'ji'fan 不值香积饭
'bu'zhi'xiang'shui'ji'gao'shen 不知湘水几篙深
'bu'zhi'xing'ying'gu 不知形影孤
'bu'zhi'xiu'gu'you'cun'fou 不知朽骨犹存否
'bu'zhi'xu'li'tian'duo'shao 不知圩里田多少
'bu'zhi'xue'yi'shen 不知雪已深
'bu'zhi'yi'ding'xiang 不知意定向
'bu'zhi'you'wo'ding'you'tian 不知由我定由天
'bu'zhi'you'yi'fu'wu'qing 不知有意复无情
'bu'zhi'yu'cong'he'chu'lai 不知雨从何处来
'bu'zhi'yu'ren'an'wen'fou 不知於人安稳否
'bu'zhi'yu'zhong'xu 不知馀中虚
'bu'zhi'yuan'you'shu'shui'jia 不知园囿属谁家
'bu'zhi'zao'wu'di'xiang'qiong 不知造物底相穷
'bu'zhi'zhe'jin'xi'hu'liu 不知折尽西湖柳
'bu'zhi'zhi'ju'nai'suo'bian 不知治剧乃所便
'bu'zhi'zhu'gong'sha'jin 不知诸公杀尽
'bu'zhi'zhu'wai'zhang'jiang'jin 不知竹外长江近
'bu'zhi'zi'you'mu'kuai'ti 不知自有木駃騠
'bu'zhi'zuo'ke'zai'shan'yang 不知作客在山阳
'bu'zhong'zi'hong'reng'zi'bai 不种自红仍自白
'bu'zhong'zi'sheng'zhi 不种自生植
'bu'zhu'cheng'jia'zhi 卜筑成佳致
'bu'zhu'jian'wu'shi'jing'xiao 卜筑兼无市井嚣
'bu'zhu'kuan'xiang'zhu'weng'men 不住宽乡住瓮门
'bu'zhuan'kuai'ran'ju 不专块然居
'bu'zhuang'yan'yi'jue 不妆艳已绝
'bu'zhuo'zi'cheng'wen 不琢自成文
'bu'zi'an'dang'ning 不自安当宁
'bu'zi'kui'chi'you'sheng'gui 不自愧耻犹生归
'bu'zi'wei'zheng'ting'tian'di 不自为政听天地
'bu'zu'xie'pin'di 不足偕品第
'bu'zu'yu'shi 不足於食
'bu'zui'duo'chou'zui'duo'bing 不醉多愁醉多病
'bu'zui'yi'tao'ran 不醉亦陶然
'bu'zuo'ba'nie'lv 不作罢苶虑
'bu'zuo'du'shu'ye 不作赌墅谒
'bu'zuo'huai'chu'ge 不作淮楚隔
'bu'zuo'huang'ge'xiang 不作黄阁想
'bu'zuo'jiang'liu'ai 不作江流碍
'bu'zuo'le'ye 不作乐也
'bu'zuo'pi'wen'ke 不作伾文客
'bu'zuo'qian'tan'shui'shi'mou 不作前滩水石谋
'bu'zuo'qin'yue'yi 不作秦越异
'bu'zuo'tian'xia'fu 布作天下福
'bu'zuo'wu'yang'yun'yu'xian 不作巫阳云雨仙
'bu'zuo'xiao'jin'nuan'zhang'kan 不作销金暖帐看
'bu'zuo'yi'qian'zhi 不作一钱直
'cai'ba'huo'ta'qian'wan'ren 菜把活它千万人
'cai'ba'reng'dao'di'zhu'en 菜把仍叨地主恩
'cai'bai'yu'ri 才百馀日
'cai'bo'nan'qu'gong'feng'ban 才薄难趋供奉班
'cai'bo'nan'sheng'ren 才薄难胜任
'cai'bu'fei'ju'wang 采不费罝网
'cai'cai'bu'ying'ju 采采不盈掬
'cai'cai'huang'jin'hua 采采黄金花
'cai'cai'shuang'lu'jian 采采霜露间
'cai'cha'ge 采茶歌
'cai'cheng'wei'jiu'zhi'he'xian 才成未就知何限
'cai'chu'chen'lai'shang'wei'zhi 才出尘来尚未知
'cai'chuan'chun'xi'cheng 彩船春戏城
'cai'da'nan'wei'yong 材大难为用
'cai'de'tian'yan'yi'xiao'kai 才得天颜一笑开
'cai'di'xiao'you'lie 才地校优劣
'cai'di'yang'jia'shu 才抵羊胛熟
'cai'du'yang'zi'yi'wen'wa 才渡扬子已闻哇
'cai'fan'nai'xia'yi'chun'zi 彩幡耐夏宜春字
'cai'fang'duo'shi'shi 采访多失实
'cai'fei'ren'yu'shou 菜肥人愈瘦
'cai'gao'shu'wei'shi 才高殊未识
'cai'gao'xing'yi'chun 才高行亦淳
'cai'ge'qing'xi'bian'wu'su 才隔清溪便无俗
'cai'guo'qing'ni'chun'bian'hao 才过青泥春便好
'cai'hong'tian'ji'wo'qing'shen 彩虹天际卧清深
'cai'hou'dong'fang'lai 蔡侯东方来
'cai'hou'wen'zhi'xi 蔡侯闻之喜
'cai'hou'xiong'jun'shi 蔡侯雄俊士
'cai'hua'ru'bao'zhi'wei'xin 采花茹宝枝为薪
'cai'hun 财昏
'cai'hun'jin'bu'chi 财昏今不耻
'cai'jia'wu'qian'juan 蔡家五千卷
'cai'jian'yun'yan'zi'zi'gong 裁剪云烟字字工
'cai'jin'wu'suo'shu 财尽无所输
'cai'jing'hua'xin'feng 才经花信风
'cai'jing'kang'bo'tao 彩鲸抗波涛
'cai'ju 采菊
'cai'jue'dan'qi'gen 采蕨啖其根

'ji'fu'xi'bai'fa'jiao'chang 肌肤晳白发脚长
'ji'fu'xiang'ke'can'shao'xian 击拊想可参韶咸
'ji'fu'yi'ren 寄傅逸人
'ji'gan'fa'xiu'geng 汲甘乏修绠
'ji'gao 季高
'ji'gao'yu'suo'bian'dang'shi'zhu'gong'shi'ye 即皋羽所编当时诸公诗也
'ji'ge'chen'feng'ru 几阁晨风入
'ji'gou'you'qian'zhu 基构有遣躅
'ji'gu 集古
'ji'gu'chui'sheng'huan'ke'yin 击鼓吹笙欢客饮
'ji'gu'chui'xiao'tu'bai'yang 击鼓吹箫屠白羊
'ji'gu'fan'zheng'dong'di'hu 急鼓繁钲动地呼
'ji'gu'kun'cai'xian 羁孤困猜嫌
'ji'gu'qiong'shan'she 羁孤穷山舍
'ji'gu'xu 集古序
'ji'gu'xue'lei'xian 羁孤血泪县
'ji'guan'hua'ge'zhu'qiang'li 鸡冠花隔竹枪篱
'ji'guang'dong'ti'xing'lin'qian'zhi'si'ye 寄广东提刑林谦之司业
'ji'guang'fu'wa'bi'cha'cha 霁光浮瓦碧差差
'ji'gui'dao'yuan'le'can'shu 急归道院了残书
'ji'gui'shang'leng'ran 既归尚冷然
'ji'gui'zhen'ke'ai 汲归真可爱
'ji'guo'lu'shan'nan 及过庐山南
'ji'guo'zhao'fu'shi'zai'xun'yang 寄郭招甫时在浔阳
'ji'hai'jie'cang'shan 际海皆苍山
'ji'han 极寒
'ji'han'bu'zuo'qi'nu'nian 饥寒不作妻孥念
'ji'han'dun'jie'liu'wen'shu 饥寒顿解刘文叔
'ji'han'ken'geng'ming 鸡寒肯更鸣
'ji'han'wei'zhi'qie'an'ju 饥寒未至且安居
'ji'hang'ye'ya'shu'sheng'yan 几行野鸭数声雁
'ji'hao'si'lin'qi 鸡号四邻起
'ji'hao'tai'chong 寄郝太冲
'ji'he'ji'fen'wei 几合几分违
'ji'he'mei'hua'shi 芰荷美花实
'ji'he'quan'xiang'zhi'he'xin 讥诃劝相知何心
'ji'he'shou'wu'wan'yu'you'ren 寄何首乌丸与友人
'ji'he'zhi'qiu'chui 讥诃致囚箠
'ji'hen'hun'si'chi 屐痕浑似齿
'ji'hu'jin'li'cui'kai'zha 急呼津吏催开闸
'ji'hu'xie'yan'yue'long'ya 急呼蟹眼瀹龙牙
'ji'huai'san'shou 寄怀三首
'ji'huang'ji'fu 寄黄吉甫
'ji'huang'xi 寄黄晞
'ji'hui'ai'jiu'you'ting'bei 几回爱酒又停杯
'ji'hui'si'suan'ji'qi'ran 几回思算几凄然
'ji'hui'wu'jiu'yu'gu'jun 几回无酒欲沽君
'ji'hui'wu'zuo'qiong'lu'xia 几回兀坐穹庐下
'ji'hui'xiang'yi'shang'yu'chuan 几回相忆上渔船
'ji'huo'gong'zhi'lei'si 既获躬执耒耜
'ji'huo'shao'chang'zuo'niu'hou 饥火烧肠作牛吼
'ji'ji'bu'ke'shu 戢戢不可数
'ji'ji'chan'shi 寄纪禅师
'ji'ji'chu'niao'zhou 戢戢出鸟咮
'ji'ji'ding'yu'cheng 戢戢丁欲成

'ji'ji'geng'shang'huai 寂寂更伤怀
'ji'ji'jian'shi'po 汲汲艰食迫
'ji'ji'liang'zhu'fu'shuang'wan 岌岌两柱扶霜纨

'ji'ji'zuo'duo'bing 寂寂坐多病

'ji'jia'sui'yuan'huai 既嫁遂愿怀
'ji'jian'tai'shou'fa 几见太守发
'ji'jian'yin'xu'yuan'xia'mu 即见引须缘夏木

'ji'jiang'jian'cha 汲江煎茶

'ji'jiang'tong'lei'sai'yao'chong 汲将同类塞要冲

'ji'jin'mei'zi'yi'huang'xi 即今梅子已黄稀
'ji'jin'mo'fu'qu 继今摩腹去
'ji'jin'ni'er'yan 亟进逆耳言
'ji'jin'ni'xing'gong'shi'shi 即今拟形供食事
'ji'jin'qing'ye'meng 即今清夜梦
'ji'jin'shan'ye 即金山也
'ji'jin'si'zhu'duan 即今私铸断
'ji'jin'you'yu'qi'qian'chong 积金犹欲齐灊崈
'ji'jing 极精
'ji'jing'an'ji'you'wei'ti 寂静庵基犹未薙
'ji'jing'bu'yi'ming 鸡竟不一鸣
'ji'jing'gua'gao'liu 霁景挂高柳
'ji'jing'qu'qiu'zhu'zi'bin 急景驱秋著髭鬓
'ji'jing'ru'ti'xing 寄景孺提刑
'ji'jiu'bu'neng'mei 及久不能寐
'ji'ju'jiang'cong'huan'a'tian 急具姜葱唤阿添
'ji'ju'kuang'ge'lao'wa'pen 箕踞狂歌老瓦盆
'ji'jue 及觉
'ji'jue'fu'meng'hun 既觉复梦魂
'ji'jun'dong'ge'xian'zheng'li 寄君东阁闲烝栗
'ji'ke'ben'gao'yi 饥渴奔高谊

'ji'ku'nian'gu'xia 羁苦辇毂下

'jue'jing'nan'dao'wei'wo'gong 绝境难到惟我共
'jue'jing'tian'wei'po 绝境天为破
'jue'jing'zi'wang'qian'li'yuan 绝境自忘千里远
'jue'ju 绝句
'jue'lai'luo'bi'bu'jing'yi 觉来落笔不经意
'jue'lai'yi'mang'mei 觉来已茫昧
'jue'lai'yin'ji'meng 觉来因记梦
'jue'lian'bing'ke'wu'ban'yan 绝怜病客无半眼
'jue'lian'cao'zhou'er 绝怜操舟儿
'jue'lian'hong'chuan'huang'mao'lang 绝怜红船黄帽郎
'jue'liang'ying'bu'si 绝粮应不死
'jue'lu'shi'tian'xie 爵禄实天械
'jue'nu'ying'an'cong 蹶弩映岸丛
'jue'pin'nai'da'li 厥品乃大戾
'jue'qi'shui'dang'shao'xing'hou 崛起谁当绍兴后
'jue'qi'sui'chong'feng 决起随冲风
'jue'qiang'you'ci'ping'jiang'huai 崛强又此凭江淮
'jue'ran'jing'qi'tian'jiang'xiao 蹶然惊起天将晓
'jue'ran'shang'hao'jiao 绝髯尚号叫
'jue'ru'er'mu'ying 觉汝耳目荧
'jue'ruo'shen'ji'zhi 绝若神挤至
'jue'se'guan'gu'jun 绝色馆孤峻
'jue'she'tang'ke'xue 鴂舌倘可学
'jue'sheng'nan'mo'nian'cheng'chen 绝胜南陌碾成尘
'jue'sheng'ren'jian'jiao'shi'fei 绝胜人间较是非
'jue'si'ren'you'de 绝似人有德
'jue'ti'sui'qiang'cheng 抉剔虽强成
'jue'tu'tuan'sha'wei'ci'nong 攫土抟沙为此弄
'jue'wu'yi'dian'shi'chen'sha 绝无一点世尘沙
'jue'xian'he'ru'zhi'ting'shou 绝弦何如只停手
'jue'xiao'lu'bai'yi'ming'ming 橛枭卢白意冥冥
'jue'xu'si'zhu'yu'an'shi 绝须丝竹娱安石
'jue'xue'bao'tian'yi 绝学抱天艺
'jue'yan'sheng'shu'yu 绝艳生殊域
'jue'yu'qing'cang'ci 决玉倾仓粢
'jue'yu'yun'heng'shi'hao'shan 绝域云横失好山
'jue'zang'yu'yi'jiang 掘葬与劓降
'jue'zhi'de'yu'xin 蹶之得舆薪
'jue'zhi'liu'luo'da'ning'jian 觉之流落大宁监
'jue'zhi'zhen'ye'shi'chang'sheng 绝知真液是长生
'jue'zhou'zhong'xun'yi'geng'chang 潏洲重寻意更长
'jue'zi'ke'xing'qian'ri'zui 决眦可醒千日醉
'jue'zi'ku'wu'yi 厥子苦无依
'jun'an 筠庵
'jun'an'ou'zuo'chu 筠庵偶坐处
'jun'an'shao'bu'zhi 筠庵稍不至
'jun'an'shen'shi'zhu'an'seng 筠庵身是住庵僧
'jun'an'wu'qi 筠庵午憩
'jun'bai'jian'zhou'wo'zuo'lang 君拜监州我作郎
'jun'bei'nai'zhi'zhe 君辈乃知者
'jun'bing'yan'bao'yu 郡兵厌宝玉
'jun'bu'deng'lang'sheng 君不登郎省
'jun'bu'dong'sheng'se 君不动声色
'jun'bu'ji'chen'pu 君不祭臣仆
'jun'bu'jian 君不见
'jun'bu'jian'feng'tie'xia'tou'yun'se'si 君不见峰铁峡头云色死
'jun'bu'jian'hai'shang'kan'yang'shou'chi'jie 君不见海上看羊手持节
'jun'bu'jian'hao'zhou'zhu'yang'xian'zhi'shan'gu'jian 君不见号州朱阳县之山谷间
'jun'bu'jian'huai'fei'qu'sui'shi'feng'nian 君不见淮淝去岁是丰年
'jun'bu'jian'huang'jin'qian'zhao'hong'yu'dou 君不见黄金钱照红玉豆
'jun'bu'jian'nan'gong'zai'bao'hui 君不见南宫载宝回
'jun'bu'jian'qi'chu'zhong'zao'wei'chu'hou 君不见栖楚终遭韦处厚
'jun'bu'jian'ruan'si'zong 君不见阮嗣宗
'jun'bu'jian'wu'yi'xi'bian'su'li'ya 君不见武夷溪边粟粒芽
'jun'bu'jian'xi'han'yuan'guang'yuan'feng'jian 君不见西汉元光元封间
'jun'bu'jian'yu'qing'xu'yu'li'gu'yan 君不见虞卿须遇李固言
'jun'bu'jian'yue'fei'gong'cheng'bu'chou'shen 君不见岳飞功成不抽身
'jun'bu'jian'zhi'chi'chang'men'bi'a'jiao 君不见咫尺长门闭阿娇
'jun'bu'wen 君不闻
'jun'bu'xue'bai'gong'yin'jing'dong'zhu'wei 君不学白公引泾东注渭
'jun'cai'zhong'xi'lun 君材重细论
'jun'chang'xu'guo'wo 君常许过我
'jun'chen'qi'fen'tou 君臣契分投
'jun'cheng'lao'luo'bu'sheng'bei 郡城牢落不胜悲
'jun'chi'fang'sheng'zhuang 君齿方盛壮
'jun'chi'he'shu'jing'wang'ju'ci'wu'bai'you 君持何术径往居此无百忧
'jun'chi'shi'zhe'jie 君持使者节
'jun'ci'qu'shui'yi'qi'tu 君辞曲水亦其徒
'jun'ci'wei'qi'sen'kai'zhang 俊词伟气森开张
'jun'cong'lian'ye'pan 君从莲叶畔
'jun'cu'yu'jie'xin 军簇御街心
'jun'de'zheng'hua'xun 君德正华勋
'jun'en'dei'qing'xu'gui'qu 君恩得请许归去
'jun'en'he'lei'luo'ai'chen 君恩和泪落埃尘
'jun'en'zao'ci'yu'yin'xia 君恩早赐俞音下
'jun'fan'ji'qian'de 君凡几钱得
'jun'fang'jiu'han'yi'si'wo 君方酒酣亦思我
'jun'fang'lun'dao'cheng'hua'xun 君方论道承华勋

'jun'fu'shi'bu'chi 郡府十不啻
'jun'ge'yu'qian'qi 峻阁郁前起
'jun'gui'gu'li'he'suo'lian 君归故里何所怜
'jun'gui'lu'bu'mi 君归路不迷
'jun'gui'wei'wo'dao'xing'zi 君归为我道姓字
'jun'gui'zhi'qi'zi 君归致其子
'jun'hao'cai'you'yu 君豪才有馀
'jun'he'nian'zhi'shen 君何念之深
'jun'hong'xiao'lu'zhi'yu'gan'jin'bu'shi 筠洪小路至馀干金步市
'jun'hu'wan'sui'cui'tai'hang 军呼万岁摧太行
'jun'jia'bie'guan'xing'lin'xi 君家别馆幸临溪
'jun'jia'chu'fu'yi'bai'ji 君家厨妇一百技
'jun'jia'ci'ben'chuan'ji'shi 君家此本传几世
'jun'jia'da'ru'zhang 君家大如掌
'jun'jia'feng'zuo'ke 君家蜂作窠
'jun'jia'hua'ke'shu 君家画可数

'jun'zhong 郡中

'jun'zi'bai'shi'qin 君子百世钦
'jun'zi'bu'ci'xu 君子不此恤
'jun'zi'bu'xing'xian 君子不倖险
'jun'zi'nan'jiang'fu'ren 君自南江赴任
'jun'zi'ru'bai'ri 君子如白日
'jun'zi'ru'jin'an'zai'zai 郡子如今安在哉
'jun'zi'wu'jian'zhi 君子误见知

'zhi'yin'jiu'nai'xin 至音久乃信
'zhi'yin'zai'he'chu 知音在何处
'zhi'ying'cui'ke'zi 只应催客子
'zhi'ying'deng'huo'shi'yu'chuan 只应灯火是渔船
'zhi'ying'du'jiang'hu'zhu'jia 只应独将笏拄颊
'zhi'ying'liang'an'dang'shi'liu 只应两岸当时柳
'zhi'ying'lou'xia'ping'jie'shui 只应楼下平阶水
'zhi'ying'qian'shi'shi'shen'chou 只应前世是深雠
'zhi'ying'shen'hou'zhong 只应身后冢
'zhi'ying'tao'jing'jie 只应陶靖节
'zhi'ying'tian'pei'yu'pin'qiong 只应天配与贫穷
'zhi'ying'yi'jiu'shou 只应依旧瘦
'zhi'ying'zi'dao'xin'sheng'hao 只应自道新声好
'zhi'yong'he 至永和
'zhi'yong'he'xiao'qi'zi'shou'si 之永和小憩资寿寺
'zhi'yong'lan'fan'xi'lun'wen 只用澜翻细论文
'zhi'yong'shu'qian'juan 只拥书千卷
'zhi'you'an'jiang'man 只有安江满
'zhi'you'cheng'zhai'liang'shou'shi 只有诚斋两首诗
'zhi'you'ci'shi'jun'ya'dao 只有此诗君压倒
'zhi'you'gao'wei'lei 只有高为累
'zhi'you'guan'shu'kan'qian'ri 只有观书堪遣日
'zhi'you'huang'ji'yu'bai'ri 只有黄鸡与白日
'zhi'you'jiu'ren'jiao'tian'tai 只有九仞郊天台
'zhi'you'lao'jiao'pan'shi'weng 知有老蛟蟠石瓮
'zhi'you'li'ren'ye'ye'ting 只有离人夜夜听
'zhi'you'meng'you'yang 只有梦悠扬
'zhi'you'mi'le'wei'tong'kan 只有弥勒为同龛
'zhi'you'ming'hua'ku'you'du 只有名花苦幽独
'zhi'you'nan'zhi'shang'fan'hun 只有南枝尚返魂
'zhi'you'nian'nian'hong'yan'fei 只有年年鸿雁飞
'zhi'you'qiang'wei'jian'di'hua 知有蔷薇涧底花
'zhi'you'qin'cong'yu'mi'shu 只有琴聪与蜜殊
'zhi'you'qing'shan'dui'bing'weng 只有青山对病翁
'zhi'you'qing'shi'chao'fan'ke 只有清诗嘲饭颗
'zhi'you'ren'jian'xian'fu'nv 只有人间闲妇女
'zhi'you'shen'wu'zhu 知有神物主
'zhi'you'shu'sheng'zhuo 只有书生拙
'zhi'you'wei'deng'zhao'ming'mie 只有微灯照明灭
'zhi'you'wu'he'zhen'wo'li 只有无何真我里
'zhi'you'wu'zhen'yi'wu'shen 至游无朕亦无身
'zhi'you'xi'shan'si'gu'ren 只有西山似故人
'zhi'you'xin'shi'song'wan'fen 只有新诗颂万分
'zhi'you'xing'shi'jue'yi'xiang 只有醒时觉异乡
'zhi'you'xue'er'gong'bi'yan 知有雪儿供笔砚
'zhi'you'ying'shui'qing'er'shu 只有颍水清而姝
'zhi'you'yue'ming'xi'hai'shang 只有月明西海上
'zhi'you'zhe'xian'liu'ju'chu 只有谪仙留句处
'zhi'yu'dan'bo'qu'yao'ming 直欲淡泊趋杳冥
'zhi'yu'du'cheng'gong'yi'chun 只与都城共一春
'zhi'yu'jing'ye'mo'bu'qu 只馀净业磨不去
'zhi'yu'kou'hao 致语口号
'zhi'yu'lin'seng'yue'wang'huan 祗与邻僧约往还
'zhi'yu'ou'lu'wu'ju'guan 只馀鸥鹭无拘管
'zhi'yu'shou'zhi'shuang'tong'zai 只馀手植双桐在
'zhi'yu'tun'yu'xian 志欲吞宇县
'zhi'yu'xin'shang'du'nan'jiang 只馀心赏独难降
'zhi'yu'xing'ren'jin'song'ying 只与行人禁送迎
'zhi'yu'ye'qiong'sheng'gong'bei 只与夜蛩声共悲
'zhi'yu'zhi'bei'yi'mao'yan 只欲炙背依茅檐
'zhi'yu'zhong'yi'xiang'chen'fu 直与忠义相沉浮
'zhi'yu'zuo'wen'zhang 至于作文章
'zhi'yuan'bian'tou'chang'wu'shi 只愿边头长无事
'zhi'yuan'di'zi'jin'he'gu 只园弟子尽鹤骨
'zhi'yuan'feng'zhong 至元丰中
'zhi'yuan'mao'yi'yu'si'qin 直缘毛义欲私亲
'zhi'yuan'shou'guan'gua 置院收鳏寡
'zhi'yuan'wu'lei'sa'xin'ting 只缘无泪洒新亭
'zhi'yuan'you'dai'shi'chao'sheng 只缘犹带市朝声
'zhi'yue'qi'chuang 置乐器床
'zhi'zai'hai'nan'zhong'ge'gui 知在海南种蛤归
'zhi'zai'ji'ming'quan'fei'zhong 只在鸡鸣犬吠中
'zhi'zai'ji'shang'wan 置在几上玩
'zhi'zai'shan'nan'bei 志在山南北
'zhi'zai'xian'sheng'zhi'gu'zhong 只在先生指顾中
'zhi'zang'shu'wang'xia'shang'nv 知葬舒王下殇女
'zhi'zao'yi'suo'bian 直造意所便
'zhi'zhao'dong'shan'ba'jiu'leng 只照东山八九棱
'zhi'zhao'hai'jing'ti'jiang'xi'dao'yuan 只召还京题江西道院
'zhi'zhe'chu'wei'xi 智者畜为戏
'zhi'zhe'da'shi'shi'ye 智者大师是也
'zhi'zhe'gu'dong 至鹧鸪洞
'zhi'zhen'kan'dou'bing 支枕看斗柄
'zhi'zhen'xing'he'heng'zui'hou 支枕星河横醉后
'zhi'zhi'bu'de'shu 直指不得数
'zhi'zhi'chu'yue'wei'tian'ya 只知楚越为天涯
'zhi'zhi'jing'li'chun'nan'zhu 只知镜里春难驻
'zhi'zhi'meng'bao'ben'lai'kong 只知梦饱本来空
'zhi'zhi'shi'yu'dong 指知食欲动
'zhi'zhi'wu'fu'dao 置之勿复道
'zhi'zhi'wu'qi'ri 置之五七日
'zhi'zhi'ye'yuan 之至也远
'zhi'zhi'ying'guo'yong 只知营国用
'zhi'zhi'zhu'sheng'hu'wang'han 只知逐胜忽忘寒
'zhi'zhong'gao'shan'bu'zhong'tian 只种高山不种田
'zhi'zhong'luo'bo 只种萝卜
'zhi'zhou 滞舟
'zhi'zhu'gang'tou'wan'zui'hong 踯躅冈头挽醉红
'zhi'zhu'han'hua'san'liang'ge 只著寒花三两个
'zhi'zhu'shu'yan'er 质诸书焉耳
'zhi'zhu'tun'sheng'lei'an'qing 踯躅吞声泪暗倾
'zhi'zhu'wan'shu'hong'xiang'wei 踯躅万树红相围
'zhi'zhu'wen'fu'wei'zhan'ju 置诸文府为战具
'zhi'zhu'zheng'ku'kong'ting'kuo 蜘蛛政苦空庭阔
'zhi'zhuang'ai'er'tuo 质状矮而橢
'zhi'zhuang'hu'zhi'dun'fu 至状虎之蹲伏
'zhi'zhuang'xing'ru'jin 治装行入觐
'zhi'zhuang'zhen'hu'zhi'tai 至状真虎之态
'zhi'zhui'wu'di'ye'wu'zhui 置锥无地也无锥
'zhi'zi'bu'bu'zao 知子不餔糟
'zhi'zi'bu'zhi'xin'suo'qi 指自不知心所起
'zhi'zi'dong'liang'cai 之子栋梁材

'zi'qi'bu'yu'yang 子岂不欲养
'zi'qi'de'suo'ru 自期得所如
'zi'qi'kong'shou'jian'yi'shuang 紫气空收剑一双
'zi'qi'shen'hu 子其神乎
'zi'qi'si'ren'hou 子起斯人后
'zi'qi'xi'shu'wu'lang'xu 子其惜术无浪许
'zi'qi'xun'jia'yi 子起寻裌衣
'zi'qi'yin'yun'sui'qu'bu 紫气氤氲随去步
'zi'qian'chi'jiao'gu'cun'niang 自遣赤脚沽村酿
'zi'qin'yi'lai 自秦以来
'zi'qing'bai'mi'shou'wu'leng 恣倾白蜜收五棱
'zi'qiong'zhi'ya'jian'gao'qiu 自邛之雅渐高丘
'zi'qu'bu'zao'hai 子去不早还
'zi'qu'wo'wei'zhi 子去我未至
'zi'qu'yi'yi'ran 子去亦宜然
'zi'ran'fu'gui'chu'tian'zi 自然富贵出天姿
'zi'ran'tian'xing'xiao'jue'yi 自然天性晓绝艺
'zi'ru'tong'jun'lu 子入桐君录
'zi'sha'zi'ji'ru'zi'he 自莎自棘如子何
'zi'shan'xie'lv'yan 兹山谢闾阎
'zi'shan'yi'qi'zhen 兹山抑其镇
'zi'shan'yu'dai'liang'bu'quan 紫衫玉带两部全
'zi'shao'duo'yan'wan'wen'dao 自少多言晚闻道
'zi'shao'shang'pan'shi'chao'de 自苕上潘氏抄得
'zi'shao'xing'wu'nian'yi'han'hou 自绍兴五年一旱后
'zi'she'guang'rong'shen'zhuang'jian 子舍光荣身壮健
'zi'she'ruo'fei'dao'bie'cheng 子舍若非叨别乘
'zi'sheng'yin'yan'fan'xiao'zhou'xia'gao'xi 自声音岩泛小舟下高溪
'zi'shi 自适
'zi'shi'chou'yi'bu 子识愁意不
'zi'shi'fei'suo'yi 兹事非所宜
'zi'shi'feng'nian'you'xiao'sheng 自是丰年有笑声
'zi'shi'guai'wo'shao 子时怪我少
'zi'shi'he'fan'mu 自誓何樊母
'zi'shi'hong'chen'fei'bu'dao 自是红尘飞不到
'zi'shi'hua'zhong'wu'guo'se 自是花中无国色
'zi'shi'jun'wang'bu'dong'xin 自是君王不动心
'zi'shi'lao'nian'you'xing'shao 自是老年游兴少
'zi'shi'li'zhuang'jie 自誓立壮节
'zi'shi'po'jiong'ji 兹时颇窘急
'zi'shi'qian'chen'duo'bing 自是迁臣多病
'zi'shi'qing'huai'wei'ku'ping 自是情怀未苦平
'zi'shi'ren'xin'bu'zan'xian 自是人心不暂闲
'zi'shi'ru'qing'feng 子诗如清风
'zi'shi'shan'qi'shou'fa'cheng 自是山妻手法成
'zi'shi'shi'wu'ying 兹时实无营
'zi'shi'yan'chang'qing 自是眼长青
'zi'shi'yi'jian'tui 子诗亦见推
'zi'shi'you'meng'guang 子室有孟光
'zi'shi'ze'ran'fou 兹事则然否
'zi'shi'zhi'yu'jian'jin'mai 自视直欲见筋脉
'zi'shui'dong'jia'you'si'qian'ju'he'jiang'lou 自水东嘉祐寺迁居合江楼
'zi'shuo'qu'a'you'wei'wen 自说曲阿犹未稳
'zi'shuo'yan'ku'ju'du'cheng 自说厌苦居都城
'zi'song'qing'bian'man'chao'shi 自送青编满朝市
'zi'song'yao'lin'li 资送耀邻里
'zi'su'he'yi'da 兹俗何以答
'zi'sui'chao'yi'qi 恣睢超一气
'zi'sui'mo'neng'ming 恣睢莫能名
'zi'sun'ban'ban'ban'chu'ni 紫笋斑斑半出泥
'zi'sun'bu'wang 子孙不忘
'zi'sun'duo'yi'bai'cheng'jiang 子孙多以百城降
'zi'sun'jin'ji'shi 子孙今几世
'zi'sun'sui'bu'chang 紫笋虽不长
'zi'sun'yuan'zhi 子孙远至
'zi'suo'yu'ting'yue 自锁鱼亭月
'zi'tan'ku'yan'liu 自叹苦淹留
'zi'tang'hao'xiao'chang'an 自唐号小长安
'zi'teng'cui'man'jie'jiao'ku 紫藤翠蔓皆焦枯
'zi'tian'chi'yi'jie 自天持一节
'zi'wai'chu'li'zhong'cang'leng 字外出力中藏棱
'zi'wan'pu'su'pan'long'cha 紫碗铺粟盘龙茶
'zi'wang'yu'gu'ren 自望于古人
'zi'wang'zeng'zhe'ce 子亡憎者恻
'zi'wei'bo'ru'gao 自为薄如缟
'zi'wei'hua'bang'xi'yang'kai 紫薇花傍夕阳开
'zi'wei'xian'ren'wu'jiao'jin 紫微仙人乌角巾

'zi'wei'xiong'yi'da 自谓胸臆大
'zi'wei'zong'jiao'shi 自谓总角时
'zi'wen'dan'xiao'ji'shi'shang 自问丹霄几时上
'zi'wen'liu'lian'qie'yi'yue 自闻留连且一月
'zi'wen'ru'xiu'pan 子文如绣鞶
'zi'wo'de'su'ji 自我得苏集
'zi'wo'lai'guan'fu 自我来关辅

'zi'wo'you'du 自我幽独

'zi'wu'she'ru'dong 自吾舍汝东
'zi'wu'shi'ci'you 自吾失此友
'zi'xi'hao'bin'ke 自昔好宾客
'zi'xi'she'li'xiu'bai'ye 自昔阇黎修白业
'zi'xi'you'wei'quan 自昔有微泉
'zi'xi'zi'you'sheng'ping'ri 自喜兹游胜平日
'zi'xia'lian'san'yan'liu'li'zhong 紫霞潋氵艳琉璃钟
'zi'xian'duo'bing'shao'huan'yan 自嫌多病少欢颜
'zi'xian'fa'cao'yuan 子先发曹掾
'zi'xiao'chen'zhong'you'huan'ke 自笑尘中游宦客
'zi'xiao'chi'xin'tian'yu'tong 自小赤心天与通
'zi'xiao'ci'he'nan 自笑此何难
'zi'xiao'gu'wen'li 自小固闻礼
'zi'xiao'jiu'chang'kong'ban'zai 自笑酒肠空半在
'zi'xiao'kuang'fu'lao'bu'kuang 自笑狂夫老不狂
'zi'xiao'ping'sheng'wei'kou'mang 自笑平生为口忙
'zi'xiao'qu'qu'meng'li'shen 自笑区区梦里身
'zi'xiao'si'bi'kong 自笑四壁空
'zi'xiao'wo'lai'feng'ba'yue 自笑我来逢八月
'zi'xiao'xi'wei'chen'tu'ren 自笑昔为尘土人
'zi'xiao'xiang'chou'geng'fei'ran 自笑相酬更斐然
'zi'xiao'yu'shi'wei 自笑与世违
'zi'xie'lu'yu'jian'ru'tu 紫蟹鲈鱼贱如土
'zi'xie'qing'jing'zuo'fan'cai 自撷青菁作饭材
'zi'xing'chuan'sai'qi'can'qi 紫荇穿腮气惨凄
'zi'xing'de'suo'yuan 子行得所愿
'zi'xing'he'shu'shu 子行何舒舒
'zi'xing'ru'bing'hu 子行如冰壶

'zi'xing'you'sheng'shi 兹行有胜事
'zi'xiu'wu'suo'you 自羞无所有
'zi'xu 自叙
'zi'xu'ben'yue'yu'tao'tou 子胥奔跃于涛头
'zi'xu'qiao'cui'ban'yi'ban 髭须憔悴半已斑
'zi'xue'bei'mian'wu'shi'xi 眦血被面无时晞

'zi'yan'san'shi'chong'pai'hu 自言三世充拍户

'zi'yi'er'guan 紫衣而冠
'zi'yi'gu'zu'duo 子意固足多
'zi'yi'ji'bu'qian 兹意极不浅
'zi'yi'mao'zhi'xin'mao 自乙卯至辛卯

'zi'yi'shen'shi'cheng'cha'ke 自疑身是乘槎客

'zi'yi'yi'han'shu 恣意移寒暑
'zi'yi'you'tie'guan'yao'xi 自宜有铁关腰膝
'zi'ying'cheng'chi'di 自应成赤地

'zi'you'han'qiong'ti'shuo'chou 自有寒蛩替说愁
